subject: Implementation of Special Concession to NHAI`s Employees working in Kashmir Valley as per DoPT`s Om Dated 08.01.2019
text: HRay <rhy TTTf gfetarrut 344 / Phone 91-11-2507410042527422^ Rernove Watermark Now (sq Wde7 &k_{TTHTf 4&4) 947 / Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) M-5 Q 6, #aer-10, ERGT, 7 fcrit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI Policy Guidelines/ Facilities/2020 Policy Circular No. 1.2.6.1/2020 Dated 21 January, 2020 Sub: Implementation of  Special Concessions to NHAI's Employees working in Kashmir Valley as per DoPT's OM dated 08.01.2019 Consequent upon approval of the Authority in its 145th meeting held on 27.12.2019, approvat of the Competent Authority is hereby conveyed for implementation of Department of Personnel and Training Office Memorandum No-18016/3/2018-Estt (L) dated 08.01.2019 to extend the special concessions / facilities to NHAI employees working in Kashmir Valley, as has extended to Central Govt. employees. 2'/e1 (V.K: Sharma) CGM (Coord:) (i) All Officers of HQ/ROs/PIUs / CMUs/Site Offices: (ii) Hindi Officer for Translation in Hindi. (iii) Library for hosting the circular in library site. Mm M PT 4T} NHA Jent par
